is.merkor.core
Class RelationObject

java.lang.Object
  is.merkor.core.RelationObject

public class RelationObject
extends java.lang.Object

A wrapper class for an Item connected with a list of Relations.

Version:
0.8
Author:
Anna B. Nikulasdottir

Constructor Summary
